issue.title: api.bilibili.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://api.bilibili.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.bilibili.com) ### Comment > I have set both rules "||*^app=tv.danmaku.bili,important" > and "||*.*^app=tv.danmaku.bili,important" in the custom rule list. However, the Adguard filter can not block all of them. > Username: `@lianghdx` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/aorrkqinlr4gogswcsg8kk808ogkcc8or2c33nlkfk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/irtuc26myw8occ884g44sccw4g4kkgw42vrso90k5g.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.9 System version: | Android 12 Browser: | Bilibili APP (Android package name: tv.danmaku.bili) License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block third-party Authorization header

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (Default),
Hide your IP address (47.92.68.26),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `https://223.5.5.5/dns-query`, `https://223.6.6.6/dns-query`, `https://1.12.12.12/dns-query`, `https://120.53.53.53/dns-query`
Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,

EasyList

Privacy:

AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Widgets

Other:
AdGuard DNS,
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:

issue.title: ubo list "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" breaks firefox html caching
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

2.0.53.99 - 2025-04-18T17:07:05+00:00 (c80Xt+k3QKfVoKtCS66NTw)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

all pages

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Popups filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


Enabling "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" prevents new cache entries for the html content being generated.

Steps for verification:
\- Disable "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" in ubo.
\- Visit a regular static website, navigate to another page.
\- Open devtools and observe the size transferred in the Network tab.
Navigating back and forth through the history will show transferred: cached for the pages html.
\- Enable "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" in ubo.
\- Reload the page.
\- Navigate back and forth.
The reloaded and newly opened pages will show something along transferred: 12.34kb

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: I encountered the same issue last year with "AdGuard Tracking Protection", see #21841

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


Enabling "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" prevents new cache entries for the html content being generated.

Steps for verification:
\- Disable "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" in ubo.
\- Visit a regular static website, navigate to another page.
\- Open devtools and observe the size transferred in the Network tab.
Navigating back and forth through the history will show transferred: cached for the pages html.
\- Enable "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" in ubo.
\- Reload the page.
\- Navigate back and forth.
The reloaded and newly opened pages will show something along transferred: 12.34kb

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
The `||nicovideo.jp^$removeparam=at` rule causes problems with comments not being displayed on live.nicovideo.jp, so please remove the rule or limit it to `www` subdomains.

Thanks.

issue.title: blog.livedoor.jp

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).
